Room.Name: Chambers of Veratus
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the private chambers of Veratus, the Oracle.
Room.LongDescription: The room is dim, and slightly cool with a strange perfume in the air. There is no furniture that you can see, but pillows and rare murask furs cover the floor. A pool of shimmering amber liquid is set in the center of the room, in a raised soffet with a blue robe across it.
